organization.$: Department of Statistics and Operations Research
Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering

head.citation-title: Prediction of wide-sense stationary quaternion random signals
head.abstracts: An efficient widely linear prediction algorithm is introduced for the class of wide-sense stationary quaternion signals. Specifically, using second order statistics information in the quaternion domain, a multivariate Durbin-Levison-like algorithm is derived. The proposed solution can be applied under a very general formulation of the problem, allowing for the estimation of a function of the quaternion signal which is observed through a system with both additive/multiplicative noises. © 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
